description: This entity represents a calculated number for available appointments. Attention: Be aware that the different types of appointments are not exclusive, the total amount of appointments are not equal to the sum of appointments from the different types.

callcenter.description: Appointments of this type are usually only available via human agents, usually by phone

intern.description: Appointments of this type are usually only available for authenticated workstations

public.description: Appointments of this type are available for everyone

slotnumber.description: This field is set, if the slot is part of a incrementing list of slots

time.description: Format is 12:34 with HH:mm without seconds. This field is set, if the slot represents a time of a day
